text: Viburnum macrocephalum ( "hydrangea viburnum", or "tree hydrangea"), common name Chinese snowball, is a species of flowering plant in the family Adoxaceae (formerly Caprifoliaceae), native to mainland China. Germplasm Resources Information Network: Viburnum macrocephalum Its fertile form, Viburnum macrocephalum f. keteleeri (, qiong hua, "white jade flower"), is of great cultural significance in China. ==Gallery== File:OB Viburnum macrocephalum P1000593.JPG|Viburnum macrocephalum File:Viburnum macrocephalum f.keteleeri.JPG|Viburnum macrocephalum File:Chinese snowball.jpg|Viburnum macrocephalum f. keteleeri File:Viburnum macrocephalum f. keteleeri.jpg|Viburnum macrocephalum f. keteleeri ==References== macrocephalum
title: Viburnum macrocephalum
